attributes.action: Taking Photos of children in a public place without adult consent
attributes.additional_details: My child and her friends were manipulated by an adult to allow photos to be taken of them without adult consent but because if was in a public place it’s not illegal but if it was in my garden it would have different. It was by my front door.
attributes.background: The law states that photos can be taken in a public place including children without adult consent

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560090
